contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1987 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). The Accursed Huntsman Radisson Blu Edwardian Manchester Hotel, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes - 1st £400, 2nd £300, 3rd £200, 4th £150. 22 bands competed May 1, 2010, 4:39 p.m. March 31, 2017, 9:30 p.m. 1 Blackburn and Darwen Band Alec Evans 2 Swinton Concert Brass [Manchester] David King 3 Ransome Band David James 4 Lindley Band Neil Jowett 5 Newham Band Melvin White 6 Rockingham Band Graham O'Connor Unknown Result Kirkintilloch Band Walter B. Hargreaves Unknown Result Luton Band David Baron Unknown Result Thoresby Colliery Keith Wilkinson Unknown Result Rhodian Brass Murray Slater Unknown Result Oxford Concert Brass John Clark Unknown Result Aveley Band Martin Heartfield Unknown Result Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson Unknown Result Ibstock Brick Brass Roy Curran Unknown Result Brodsworth Colliery Band Peter Parkes Unknown Result Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) David Hirst Unknown Result Jayess (Queensbury) Band Jim Shepherd Unknown Result Rochdale Band Nicholas Childs Unknown Result Fishburn Band Derek Broadbent Unknown Result Cinderford Band Cecil Chappell Unknown Result Greenalls Band Gordon Clough Unknown Result Roberts Bakery Band Colin Cranson Withdrawn Foresters Brass Geoffrey Whitham Withdrawn Foresters Brass Geoffrey Whitham
